content: introducing the happy hippy scarf a great scarf project for beginners you can make this happy hippy scarf with the granny stripe stitch double_crochet and treble_crochet stitch this is a fun boho style accessory for the fall and winter season or any time of the year i used worsted weight 4 yarn or aran weight if you are in the uk it is a great project for using up any of your stash yarn it is elegant and super trendy there are right and left handed video tutorials 1 on my youtube channel 1 https //youtu be/way1ckgix1w si=lfq17rk2cnrktlov
